insert into h_apply_move (from_dept, to_dept, `status`, work_date, `type`, creater_id, create_time) values (#{fromDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update h_apply_move set from_dept = #{fromDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_dept = #{toDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_date = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, from_dept, to_dept, `status`, work_date, `type`, creater_id, create_time from h_apply_move
